title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Physical / Mobility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Physical / Mobility              Physical / Mobility       Chickamauga Battlefield Visitor Center For Those With Mobility Impairments: The visitor center is fully accessible. Restrooms are located inside the visitor center lobby. The theater is also fully accessible. Chickamauga Battlefield For Those With Mobility Impairments: Touring may be conducted in your own vehicle. There is also a cell phone tour available for visitors to use in order to tour the battlefield. Wayside plaques, markers, monuments, and exhibits along the tour route are partially accessible on paths that are relatively flat, grass or dirt covered areas. There are handicapped accessible restrooms at the Wilder Brigade Monument (Tour Stop 6). Lookout Mountain Battlefield Visitor Center For Those With Mobility Impairments: The visitor center is fully accessible. Restrooms are located just outside the visitor center lobby. Lookout Mountain Battlefield (Point Park) For Those With Mobility Impairments: Touring is conducted along a rock and paved path around the perimeter of Point park. There are benches located along the path. The Ochs Museum and Observatory is the only area that is not handicapped accessible. Cravens House For Those With Mobility Impairments: The house is not handicapped accessible. Moccasin Bend National Archeological District For Those With Mobility Impairments: None of the trails, including Blue Blazes and Browns Ferry Federal Road trails, are currently handicapped accessible.
